question: Which of the following are true with regard to securing your VPC with security groups and network ACLs? (Choose two)

answers.A: Security groups control inbound and outbound traffic for your EC2 instances.
answers.B: Security groups control inbound and outbound traffic for your subnets.
answers.C: Network ACLs control inbound and outbound traffic for your EC2 instances.
answers.D: Network ACLs control inbound and outbound traffic for your subnets.
